# Kicking the Germ Out of Germany

| runtime        =
| country        = United States
| language       = Silent with English intertitles
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
Kicking the Germ Out of Germany is a 1918 American short comedy film featuring Harold Lloyd. The film is now considered a lost film.
Cast
* Harold Lloyd as The Boy
* Snub Pollard
* Bebe Daniels
* Lige Conley (credited as Lige Cromley)
* Mildred Forbes
* William Gillespie
* Helen Gilmore
* Max Hamburger
* Estelle Harrison
* Lew Harvey
* Wallace Howe
* Bud Jamison
* Dee Lampton
* Oscar Larson
* Maynard Laswell (credited as M.A. Laswell)
* Grace Madden
* Belle Mitchell
* James Parrott
* Hazel Powell
* Charles Stevenson
* Myrtle Watson
* Noah Young

* Harold Lloyd filmography
* List of lost films
